alert.note: Alert for Northern Centre; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CENTRE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bellefonte, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Bellefonte, Carroll, Woodward, Lamar, Zion, Mill Hall, Milesburg, Millheim, Snow Shoe, Blanchard, Clarence, Aaronsburg, Rebersburg, Madisonburg, Bald Eagle State Park, Mackeyville, Howard, Beech Creek, Loganton and McCall Dam State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Northern Centre; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
